text: Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi venyu ndivo vakasika matenga nenyika mumazuva matanhatu uye vakabva vakwira pamusoro pechigaro chehumambo (nenzira inoenderana nehukuru wavo), vachifambisa hurongwa hwezvinhu zvose. Hakuna humiriri kunze nekuda kwavo. Ava ndivo Allah, Tenzi venyu, nokudaro vanamatei (ivo voga). Nokudaro hamurangariri here
